examples: the vocal organs (= the tongue, lips, etc.)
There will be a test of both oral and written French.
the vocal organs (= the tongue, lips, etc.)

meanings.def: telling people your opinions or protesting about something loudly and with confidence
examples: He has been very vocal in his criticism of the government's policy.
The protesters are a small but vocal minority.
criticized by a small but increasingly vocal minority
women who are very vocal about men's failings

meanings.def: the part of a piece of music that is sung, rather than played on a musical instrument
examples: In this recording Armstrong himself is on vocals.
